name: airConditionerOption_turnOn
description: This function is used to activate a specific function or mode of an air conditioner.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to activate the mode.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to activate on the air conditioner.
